quote: Tell me, you fool. If I continue to regress, will I ever get to meet you again?
author: Yoo Joonghyuk

quote: I wish to see the novel's epilogue.
author: Kim Dokja

quote: Yoo Joonghyuk looked at me like I was mentally ill. "Kim Dokja! Don't say anything else!" Of course, I kept talking.
author: Kim Dokja

quote: 「A regressor actually doesn't regress. What actually regresses isn't him, but everything else excluding him.」
author: Unknown

quote: To think, I was learning how to make dumplings from a dumpling while walking on the Dumpling Road.
author: Kim Dokja

quote: That man is the world I wish to save.
author: Jung Heewon

quote: 「Joonghyuk-ah, we can save the world. You know that, right?」
author: Kim Dokja

quote: [You're our son. That is all that matters.]
author: Persephone
episode_name: Great War of Saints and Demons, IV

quote: 【Why, why is it not me, but you??】
author: Secretive Plotter
